## FaceForwardNode class

Flips a vector to face forward

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class FaceForwardNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns N if dot(Nref, I) &lt; 0, otherwise -N. Used to orient a normal to face away from a surface (opposite to incident direction). All three inputs must be the same vector type (vec2 or vec3).
